H0.text: Prior to Gordon Brown, who was the last British Prime Minister to represent a Scottish constituency. Alec Douglas-Home's predecessor, Harold Macmillan

H1.text: Prior to Gordon Brown, who was the last British Prime Minister to represent a Scottish constituency. Ramsay MacDonald

H2.text: Prior to Gordon Brown, who was the last British Prime Minister to represent a Scottish constituency. Henry Campbell-Bannerman

H3.text: Prior to Gordon Brown, who was the last British Prime Minister to represent a Scottish constituency. Douglas-home

A4.text: Douglas-Home was elected to the House of Commons for Kinross and West Perthshire
